title: Ammonia Storage Performance of Thiocyanate-Based Pseudo Ionic Liquids: Experimental Study and Computational Chemistry Analysis
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00659C, Paper
Yu Cao, Kejie Jiang, Dongshun Deng
Ammonia (NH3) is one of the most important industrial chemicals and also shows potential application as hydrogen energy vector. The separation and storage of NH3 play key role for its...
